description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9pp6u","text":"The following protocol pools miniaturized PCR replicates from (2) different 384-well plates into (1) final 384-well plate using the epMotion 5075. The miniaturized PCR reaction was done in triplicate across (3) 384-well plates and the third PCR plate will be the final storage plate for PCR products. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"avvv8","text":"Please wear at least the minimum required personal protective equipment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7c5o","text":"Ensure that all necessary kit components are available as well as user-supplied consumables.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93r0q","text":"Remove nuclease and nucleotide contamination from work surfaces and instruments prior to starting using an appropriate solution, such as RNase AWAY™ (Thermo Scientific™ catalogue: 700511), followed by wiping with 70% to 100% molecular biology grade ethanol to remove additional contaminants.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"438gp","text":"(3) twin.tec PCR Plate 384","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"215td","text":"(4) ep T.I.P.S. 1-50 µL  Motion Racks w/filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r24d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

affiliation: Knight Lab @ UC San Diego Health

authors_list.name: Rodolfo Salido Benitez
authors_list.affiliation: Knight Lab @ UC San Diego Health

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"c81lk","text":"If needed, thaw PCR plates, then centrifuge them.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"39tgv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"E5B1F7A0CB2E11E897E383959B6B3217","id":672582,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Prepare PCR plates"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6kdmg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a41oc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"5s1u8","text":"Follow the diagram while setting up the epMotion worktable.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3q9ui","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fd4vl","text":"Place (4) boxes of 1-50\u00b5L ep T.I.P.S. w\/filter on slots A3-A4 and B3-B4 respectively.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8f931","text":"Place PCR plates on slots A2, B2, and C2. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":181,"guid":"41281F10CB2F11E897E383959B6B3217","align":null,"brand":"Eppendorf","sku":"5075000962","specifications":"","file_id":null,"file_icon":null,"file_name":null,"image_id":null,"s3_image_name":null,"s3_file_name":null,"can_edit":true,"step_guid":"2FAF5000CB2F11E897E383959B6B3217","image_name":null,"link":null,"type":"Liquid Handling","name":"epMotion 5075"}},{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"30886","guid":"687A5830CB2F11E897E383959B6B3217","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/8fg3mm6.png","placeholder":"","original_name":"Capture4.PNG","mime":"image\/png","width":null,"height":null,"is_video":false}}],"guid":"2FAF5000CB2F11E897E383959B6B3217","id":672589,"previous_guid":"E5B1F7A0CB2E11E897E383959B6B3217","section":"Setup epMotion automation platform"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mb9d","text":"Remove box lids and plate foils and execute protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3v29b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a1oqc","text":"(Protocol must be imported to epBlue software prior to attempting to execute it. epBlue 40.6 or later)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":81,"length":20,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fq88l","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"21uc","text":"The automated protocol uses the multiaspirate feature of the epBlue software to pool PCR products from plates PCR1 and PCR2 and dispense them into plate PCR3. The command aspirates 7\u00b5L from each plate which will result in some air being aspirated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"30888","guid":"DA24B3E0CB2F11E8B8F8B73689FFD22C","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/8fi3mm6.export6","placeholder":"\/img\/extensions\/file.png","original_name":"Application_3X_pooling_3-384 to 1-384_181003_105035.export6"}}],"guid":"9AEEC1C0CB2F11E897E383959B6B3217","id":672590,"previous_id":672589,"previous_guid":"2FAF5000CB2F11E897E383959B6B3217","section":"Execute automated protocol"}
